roleset.name: returning of leukocytes to circulating pool in response to stress, seizures, chemical cause

role.descr: Agent or cause of demargination- intentional

example.name: demarginate-v
example.text: When-1 [granulocytes]-2 were demarginated *T*-2 by epinephrine *T*-1 , the mean count increased by 38%...

example.name: demargination-n
example.text: The purpose of this study was to determine the contribution of bone marrow release and demargination of PMNs to the glucocorticoid-induced granulocytosis.
